topics: Our value chain analysis reveals key competitive advantages in operations efficiency and customer service delivery. Primary activities directly create value through product development and delivery.

explanatory_text: Our value chain analysis reveals key competitive advantages in operations efficiency and customer service delivery. Primary activities directly create value through product development and delivery.
Support activities enable and enhance primary operations through strategic technology investments and talent development programs. Each function contributes to overall margin optimization.
By integrating activities across the value chain, we achieve synergies that competitors struggle to replicate, resulting in sustainable competitive advantage.
